articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The $10 trillion asset manager said it’s also exploring “permissioned blockchains, stablecoins, cryptoassets, and tokenization.”
articles.title: BlackRock Launches Spot Bitcoin Private Trust

articles.description: The exchange took decisive action to block crypto addresses associated with Tornado Cash following this week’s sanctions blow from the U.S.
articles.title: DeFi Exchange dYdX Blocking Addresses Associated With Tornado Cash

articles.author: Emily Tonelli
articles.description: A post-mortem from Curve Finance reported that “no one is safe” from frontend attacks like the one the DeFi exchange suffered on Tuesday.
articles.title: Curve ‘Strongly Suggests’ Domain Migration to Ethereum Name Service After $570K Frontend Hack

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto trading app Swan Bitcoin is among dozens of crypto businesses affected by a data breach suffered by email marketing firm Klaviyo.
articles.title: Swan Bitcoin Discloses Data Leak Due to Phishing Attack on Newsletter Provider

articles.description: The token backing popular Ethereum staker Lido jumped double-digits after the final test before the merge next month.
articles.title: DeFi Token Powering Ethereum Staker Lido Finance Jumps 18%

articles.description: Experts assess the implications of the Treasury Department’s sanctioning of privacy protocol Tornado Cash earlier this week.
articles.title: Did The US Government Just Declare War on Crypto?

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Ethereum has just completed the network’s final dress rehearsal before the Merge event slated for September.
articles.title: Ethereum Up 14% as Goerli Testnet Merge Goes Live

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Another round of unannounced account suspensions leaves crypto newsletter publishers scrambling to choose a new provider.
articles.title: Mailchimp Resumes Crackdown on Crypto Newsletters Including Messari, Edge

articles.description: Noah Davis, who joined from auction house Christie’s, tells Decrypt about Yuga Labs’ plans for the influential Ethereum NFT project.
articles.title: As CryptoPunks NFT Owners Get Commercial Rights, Yuga Hopes to Secure Their ‘Legacy as Artwork'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Ripple is actively seeking to scale the company through merger and acquisition deals, a spokesperson told Reuters.
articles.title: Ripple Is Considering Buying Bankrupt Crypto Lender Celsius’ Assets: Report

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Some crypto companies are feeling the crunch of a market crash and reducing their employee headcount to cope—but others are still expanding and securing fresh talent. Here's who's hiring and firing in crypto right now.
articles.title: Who’s Firing—And Still Hiring—During the Bitcoin Bear Market

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The exchange said it would “evaluate” whether or not to list ETHW.
articles.title: Binance Is Not Ruling Out Support for Ethereum Proof-of-Work Fork

articles.description: The recent CPI report suggests that inflation in the U.S. may have peaked after rising at its fastest pace in four decades.
articles.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Rise Following Flat Inflation Reading

articles.description: Despite filing for insolvency, Berlin-based digital banking platform Nuri insists all funds in user accounts are safe.
articles.title: German Crypto Bank Nuri Files for Insolvency, Says ‘All Funds Are Safe’

articles.description: The size of the losses have sparked a joint investigation into Celsius’ demise by Canadian regulators and the SEC across the border.
articles.title: Canada's 2nd Largest Pension Fund Embroiled in Celsius Collapse

articles.description: The FTX CEO is brutally honest in his assessment of his Voyager deal, but added that he can only aim for "OK" rather than "amazing" bailout deals.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried: Voyager Deal Likely ‘$70M Down the Drain’

articles.description: Cybercriminals made off with $570,000 in Ethereum, some of it since frozen, before a fix was announced.

articles.description: As the top Solana NFT marketplace pushes into Ethereum, it wants to build a trading platform for Bored Apes—with benefits for holders.

articles.description: Tornado cash was banned yesterday. But now a naughty user is proving this ban may be difficult to enforce.
articles.title: Tornado Cash User 'Dusts' Hundreds of Public Wallets—Including Celebs Jimmy Fallon, Steve Aoki and Logan Paul

articles.description: Vitalik Buterin said the need for privacy from Russia’s government led him to use the Ethereum mixing protocol.
articles.title: Ethereum Cofounder Says He Used Now-Blacklisted Tornado Cash to Donate to Ukraine

articles.description: Amid an investigation into WazirX, Binance and its CEO have continued to distance the firm from the India-based crypto exchange.

articles.description: Arbitrum’s new gaming and social dapp-centric Nova chain is live, and Reddit could bring millions of users to it via rewards. FTX is also on board.

articles.description: The source code for crypto privacy mixer Tornado Cash has been removed from Github, prompting outcry from privacy and free speech advocates.
articles.title: 'It Doesn’t Change Anything' Says Tornado Cash After Code Disappears From GitHub

articles.description: A new proposal would see a new ERC-721 extension use stealth addresses to obscure NFT transactions on the Ethereum network.
articles.title: New NFT Privacy Proposal Gets Vitalik Buterin’s Attention

articles.description: Bitcoin miner Marathon Digital increased its Bitcoin holdings by 707 despite a quarterly decline in production.
articles.title: Crypto Miner Marathon Increased Bitcoin Holdings Amid $191.6M Quarterly Losses

articles.description: The next round of crypto withdrawals will give a majority of Zipmex clients the ability to withdraw Ethereum and Bitcoin.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange Zipmex to Re-Open Bitcoin, Ethereum Withdrawals

articles.description: The internet celebrity’s bad luck crypto investment streak continues.
articles.title: Bad Bitcoin Bettor Dave Portnoy Rages Over SafeMoon Lawsuit

articles.description: The billionaire investor shared his view on Cardano's lack of adoption, market caps, and Dogecoin on a recent podcast.

articles.title: Crypto Leaders Decry “Tyranny” of Tornado Cash Ban

articles.description: The CEO of Ark Investment says a looming SEC investigation caused “regulatory” uncertainty.
articles.title: Cathie Wood Cites SEC Securities Warning in Dropping Coinbase Stock

articles.description: Truth in Advertising (TINA) called out several celebrities for failing to disclose how they benefit from the sales of the NFTs that they promote.
articles.title: Consumer Group Demands Snoop Dogg, Paris Hilton, Other Celebs Disclose NFT Connections

articles.description: The firm also boasted that it held $1.5 billion in liquidity, most of it in cash.
articles.title: Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital Reports $554M Loss in Q2

articles.description: A second lawsuit was also filed by the company’s former HR director. And more suits may be coming.
articles.title: Ex-NFL Player and Former Exec Sues Metaverse Startup Everyrealm, Alleging Discrimination

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Security and privacy experts say it's become alarmingly common for people to report vulnerabilities on public forums like Twitter because they otherwise get ignored.
articles.title: How Secure Is the Ethereum Sitting in Your MetaMask Wallet?

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Data collected by Glassnode suggests that options traders are looking "extremely bullish" for September, but leaning bearish again for October, the month after the merge.
articles.title: How Ethereum Traders Are Preparing to Buy and Sell the Merge

articles.description: Musician and NFT artist Jimmy Edgar is fully sold on NFT art, but not convinced yet on the uses of NFTs in the music world, he told Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Why Musician and NFT Artist Jimmy Edgar Remains Skeptical on Music NFTs

articles.description: Ava Labs President John Wu sits for an extensive chat about institutional interest in crypto and DeFi (it has "absolutely not waned") and use cases of Avalanche with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Avalanche House in Brooklyn on July 15, 2022.
articles.title: Avalanche's John Wu Talks Institutional Interest and Use Cases

articles.description:
In our latest Decrypt on the Street segment, reporter Sander Lutz investigates Chipotle’s recent crypto marketing campaign and talks to Chipotle customers about their sadness amid the crypto crash. 

Sander himself entered the contest hoping to get rich; instead he got a single cup of queso dip.
articles.title: Decrypt on the Street: Chipotle Says ‘Buy the Dip!’

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson reports from NFT Expoverse in LA with JP Bedoya, Chief Product Officer at Civic, the Web3 identity verification problem rolling out a new set of tools to keep people from spamming NFT drops to take advantage.
articles.title: How Civic Is Battling Web3 Bots and Spam: CPO JP Bedoya

articles.description: Art Blocks, the generative NFT series, exploded in popularity and price last fall. Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon (aka "Snowfro") talks to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about why the price surge actually hurt Art Blocks and the problem with NFT speculators, the debate over digital art vs. traditional art and his views on Bored Apes and CryptoPunks, how he got into NFTs after starting a physical tile business with his father, and why he thinks everyone's mortgage will eventually be stored on chain.
articles.title: gm: Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon is Finding the 'Soul' in Generative Art NFTs

articles.description: The former Amazon Studios exec and venture capitalist spoke with Decrypt’s Kate Irwin about how crypto fits into the metaverse at an event in Beverly Hills, California.
articles.title: Matthew Ball on the Role of Crypto and NFTs in the Metaverse

articles.description: In an extensive conversation with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott, Binance CEO CZ talks global and US regulation, Binance HQ locations, crypto bailouts and how he approaches deals, the sports marketing push by big crypto exchanges and why Binance went slower, and why he believes we live in a simulation.
articles.title: gm: Binance CEO CZ Talks Bailouts, Regulator Demands, and Simulation Theory
